text: Nia mee ala e tigidaumaha gi Dimaadua la hagalee gai i nia gowaa ala e noho ai goodou. Hagalee gai dahi baahi e madangaholu o godou meegai, mo godou waini, mo godou lolo olib, be nia ulumaadua o godou kau mo godou siibi, be nia tigidaumaha ala gu hagababa go goodou gi Dimaadua, be go godou tigidaumaha o godou manawa, be go nia tigidaumaha ala i golo.
